name: cci-pingu
description: Periodically check for new builds (artifacts) on CircleCI and install them in turn.
author: Roman Kaspar <roman@salsitasoft.com>

scripts.build: npm run gen-ver && npm run lint && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && ./node_modules/.bin/babel code --out-dir dist --source-maps inline && npm run test
scripts.build-pkg: npm run build && cp package.json dist && cp -r config dist && rm dist/config/default.json && cd dist && npm install --production && rm package.json && find . -name "*.spec.js" -exec rm \{\} \; && COPYFILE_DISABLE=1 tar cfz ../cci-pingu.tgz *
